name: Techno Animal
description: '''Techno Animal''' was an [[electronic music|electronic]] duo formed in 1990 in London, England by British musicians [[Justin Broadrick]] (of the band [[Godflesh]]) and [[Kevin Martin (British musician)|Kevin Martin]] (aka the Bug, of the band [[God (British band)|God]]). The duo released six LPs beginning with their 1991 debut ''[[Ghosts (Techno Animal album)|Ghosts]]''. They blended [[dub reggae|dub]] production with dark, beat-oriented [[ambient music]] and paranoiac themes.
